title: Classic Watch Face
summary: A simple classic luxury watch face to compliment your lifestyle.
description: Continuum Classic watch face is a simple yet elegant watch face that does what a watch was designed to do. Tell the time. The focus of this watch is to stick to the core principles of a watch. Be accurate and definitely stylish, as the watch over the years has become a part of our daily fashion. Simply put... its Classic.FunctionsDisplays Time with hour, minute and second hands.Sweeping Second hand Displays Day of Week and DateBe sure to check out the Continuum Wear Developer Page for more exclusive watch faces
descriptionHTML:
Continuum Classic watch face is a simple yet elegant watch face that does what a watch was designed to do. Tell the time. The focus of this watch is to stick to the core principles of a watch. Be accurate and definitely stylish, as the watch over the years has become a part of our daily fashion. Simply put... its Classic.

Functions

Displays Time with hour, minute and second hands.
Sweeping Second hand
Displays Day of Week and Date

Be sure to check out the Continuum Wear Developer Page for more exclusive watch faces
